channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: Note: The links provided to software may no longer work. You can download the current and previous versions of Anaconda and Python from their respective sites. This course is based on Python 3.5. See the Anaconda for Python 3.5 FAQ. Please review the 6.0001 Style Guide (PDF) before attempting the problem sets. If you need additional help, please consult the 6.0001 list of Programming Resources (PDF). Solutions are not available.
